trans-unit.source: Prompts the user to select a folder.
trans-unit.target: Ber om at brukeren velger en mappe.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: This class provides a way to prompt the user to browse, create, and eventually select a folder.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan brukeren bedt om å bla gjennom, opprette og til slutt Velg en mappe.

trans-unit.source: Use this class when you only want to allow the user to select folders, not files.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne klassen når du bare vil tillate at brukeren velger mapper, ikke filer.

trans-unit.source: Browsing of the folders is done through a tree control.
trans-unit.target: Søk etter mappene gjøres via en Trekontroll.

trans-unit.source: Only folders from the file system can be selected; virtual folders cannot.
trans-unit.target: Du kan velge bare mapper fra filsystemet; kan ikke virtuelle mapper.

trans-unit.source: Typically, after creating a new FolderBrowserDialog, you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> to the location from which to start browsing.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis når du har opprettet en ny Bla gjennom mapper, angir du den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>til plasseringen der du begynner å bla.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> to an absolute path of a subfolder of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> that will initially be selected.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>på en absolutt bane for en undermappe for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>som først velges.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A> property to provide additional instructions to the user.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>til å gi instruksjoner til brukeren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> method to display the dialog box to the user.
trans-unit.target: Kall til slutt den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>metode for å vise dialogboksen for brukeren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the dialog box is closed and the dialog box result from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> will be a string containing the path to the selected folder.
trans-unit.target: Når dialogboksen lukkes og dialogboksen resultat av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>vil være en streng som inneholder banen til den valgte mappen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A> property to control if the user is able to create new folders with the **New Folder** button.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A>egenskap til kontrollen hvis brukeren kan opprette nye mapper med den **ny mappe** knappen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: FolderBrowserDialog is a modal dialog box; therefore, when shown, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a folder.
trans-unit.target: Bla gjennom mapper er en modal dialogboks; Derfor når vises, blokkeres resten av programmet før brukeren har valgt en mappe.

trans-unit.source: When a dialog box is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Når en dialogboks modalt, inndata (tastaturet eller musen Klikk) kan oppstå unntatt til objekter i dialogboksen.

trans-unit.source: The program must hide or close the dialog box (usually in response to some user action) before input to the calling program can occur.
trans-unit.target: Programmet må skjule eller Lukk dialogboksen (vanligvis som svar på noen brukerhandling) før programmet som kaller inndata kan oppstå.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Standardkonstruktøren initialiserer egenskapene til standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog> is created, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Environment.SpecialFolder?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A> property is set to an empty string (""), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> property is set to an empty string, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Når en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog>er opprettet av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Environment.SpecialFolder?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>er satt til en tom streng (""), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>er satt til en tom streng og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A> </xref:System.Environment.SpecialFolder?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog>

trans-unit.source: Typically, after creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog>, you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> to the location from which to start browsing.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis når du har opprettet en ny <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog>, du har angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>til plasseringen der du begynner å bla.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog>

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> to the path of a subfolder of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> that will initially be selected.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>til banen til en undermappe for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>som først velges.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A> property to provide additional instructions to the user.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>til å gi instruksjoner til brukeren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> method to display the dialog box to the user.
trans-unit.target: Kall til slutt den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>metode for å vise dialogboksen for brukeren.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the dialog box is closed and the dialog result from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> will be a string containing the path to the selected folder.
trans-unit.target: Når dialogboksen lukkes og dialogboksen resultat av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>vil være en streng som inneholder banen til den valgte mappen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog> is a modal dialog box; therefore, when shown, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a folder.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog>er en modal dialogboks; Derfor når vises, blokkeres resten av programmet før brukeren har valgt en mappe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog>

trans-unit.source: When a dialog box is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Når en dialogboks modalt, inndata (tastaturet eller musen Klikk) kan oppstå unntatt til objekter i dialogboksen.

trans-unit.source: The program must hide or close the dialog box (usually in response to some user action) before input to the calling program can occur.
trans-unit.target: Programmet må skjule eller Lukk dialogboksen (vanligvis som svar på noen brukerhandling) før programmet som kaller inndata kan oppstå.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the descriptive text displayed above the tree view control in the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir beskrivende teksten som vises over tre visningskontrollen i dialogboksen.

trans-unit.source: The Description property can be used to specify additional information to the user, like instructions.
trans-unit.target: Description-egenskapen kan brukes til å angi mer informasjon som brukeren som instruksjonene.

trans-unit.source: The description to display.
trans-unit.target: Beskrivelsen skal vises.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the **Help** button on the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren klikker den **hjelpe** -knappen i dialogboksen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Resets properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller egenskapene til standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>egenskapene til standardverdiene.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.ShowNewFolderButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of default values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste over standardverdier, kan du se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root folder where the browsing starts from.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir rotmappen der den gjennomgang starter fra.

trans-unit.source: Only the specified folder and any subfolders that are beneath it will appear in the dialog box and be selectable.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte mappen og undermappene som ligger under vil vises i dialogboksen og ikke kan velges.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> property, along with RootFolder, determines what the selected folder will be when the dialog box is displayed, as long as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> is an absolute path that is a subfolder of RootFolder (or more accurately, points to a subfolder of the shell namespace represented by RootFolder).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>egenskapen sammen med RootFolder, bestemmer hva den valgte mappen være når dialogboksen er synlig, så lenge <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>er en absolutt bane er en undermappe for RootFolder (eller mer nøyaktig peker til en undermappe for grensesnittet navneområdet som representeres av RootFolder).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.SelectedPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Environment.SpecialFolder> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref:System.Environment.SpecialFolder>verdier.</xref:System.Environment.SpecialFolder>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Desktop" name="Desktop" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Desktop" name="Desktop" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref:System.Environment.SpecialFolder> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet er ikke én av de <xref:System.Environment.SpecialFolder>verdier.</xref:System.Environment.SpecialFolder>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir banen som er valgt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: If the SelectedPath property is set before showing the dialog box, the folder with this path will be the selected folder, as long as SelectedPath is set to an absolute path that is a subfolder of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> (or more accurately, points to a subfolder of the shell namespace represented by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen SelectedPath settes før visning dialogboksen, mappen med denne banen blir den valgte mappen, så lenge SelectedPath er satt til en absolutt bane er en undermappe for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>(eller mer nøyaktig, peker til en undermappe for grensesnittet navneområdet som representeres av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog.RootFolder%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> returns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>, meaning the user clicked the **OK** button, the SelectedPath property will return a string containing the path to the selected folder.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>returnerer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>, noe som betyr at brukeren klikket den **OK** -knappen, egenskapen SelectedPath returnerer en streng som inneholder banen til den valgte mappen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A> returns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>, meaning the user canceled out of the dialog box, this property will have the same value that it had prior to displaying the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>returnerer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult>, noe som betyr at brukeren avbrøt utenfor dialogboksen, har samme verdi som den hadde før vise dialogboksen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the user selects a folder that does not have a physical path (for example, My Computer), the **OK** button on the dialog box will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: Hvis brukeren velger en mappe som ikke har en fysisk bane (for eksempel Min datamaskin) i **OK** -knappen på dialogboksen vil bli deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder first selected in the dialog box or the last folder selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: Banen til mappen først valgte i dialogboksen eller siste mappen valgt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **New Folder** button appears in the folder browser dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den **ny mappe** -knappen i dialogboksen nettleseren.

trans-unit.source: When ShowNewFolderButton is `true`, the **New Folder** button is visible, giving the user a chance to create a folder.
trans-unit.target: Når ShowNewFolderButton er `true`, **ny mappe** vises, gir brukeren mulighet til å opprette en mappe.

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the **New Folder** button, a new folder is created and the user is prompted to specify the folder name.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren klikker den **ny mappe** knappen, opprettes en ny mappe, og brukeren blir bedt om å angi navnet på mappen.

trans-unit.source: The selected node in the tree becomes the parent of the new folder.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte noden i treet blir overordnede mappen.

trans-unit.source: The actual caption of the **New Folder** button can vary depending upon the operating system > [!IMPORTANT] > Setting ShowNewFolderButton to `false` does not work on Windows 2000.
trans-unit.target: Faktiske teksten for det **ny mappe** knappen kan variere avhengig av operativsystemet > [!IMPORTANT] > innstillingen ShowNewFolderButton til `false` fungerer ikke på Windows 2000.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the **New Folder** button is shown in the dialog box; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den **ny mappe** -knappen er vises i dialogboksen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
